testsuite.name: Scenario: Create a class as an instructor, verify a student is able to access it via LTI class homepage link

testcase.name: Given I set up the LTI consumer key and shared secret if not already done
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a class as an instructor, verify a student is able to access it via LTI class homepage link

testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a class as an instructor, verify a student is able to access it via LTI class homepage link

testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a class as an instructor, verify a student is able to access it via LTI class homepage link

testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a class as an instructor, verify a student is able to access it via LTI class homepage link

testcase.name: And I save & close the new question in the assignment editor

testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a class as an instructor, verify a student is able to access it via LTI class homepage link

testcase.name: When I submit the assignment again
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a class as an instructor, verify a student is able to access it via LTI class homepage link

testcase.name: Then my score 0 out of 1 (0 %) is shown in a grade report
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a class as an instructor, verify a student is able to access it via LTI class homepage link

testcase.name: And quit and save the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a class as an instructor, verify a student is able to access it via LTI class homepage link
